events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for days, and I'm very concerned about the delay in shipping.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message mentioning late shipment and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team for further investigation regarding the delayed shipment.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's look into this for you right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID you received so I can check the shipment status in detail?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking ID is ABCD123456. The last update on the tracking website was 5 days ago.
After reviewing the tracking info, it appears the shipment is delayed due to a logistic issue. We will expedite the delivery and keep you updated daily.
Thank you for the update and the quick response. I appreciate you expediting the delivery and keeping me informed.
Your order has now been delivered. Please let us know if everything arrived as expected and if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure your package arrived safely and that you are satisfied with your purchase. We're here if you need any help.
As there have been no further concerns raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
